code:
export default{faqsList:[{title:"What is Moken?",faqs:[// `Moken is a startup hub that addresses the life cycle of a startup through four main pillars.`,
"Moken is a startup hub that works with founders and organizations to build, create, and grow their startup through four main divisions/pillars."]},{title:"What are Moken’s four pillars?",faqs:["The four pillars of Moken are: Moken Agency, Moken Programs, Moken Events and Access."]},{title:"How is Moken different than Moken Agency?",faqs:["Moken is different from Moken Agency as Moken Agency is one component of Moken as it addresses only a single aspect of what a startup needs. It addresses the building the validating and the growing of a startup."]},{title:'What Services does Moken Agency provide?',faqs:["Moken Agency provides a variety of services. For a full list, view our expertise page."]},{title:'What is Moken programs?',faqs:['Moken Programs is where we educate and collaborate with startups and founders through a co-founding model to help them accelerate their build and growth or incubate their ideas depending on the stage of the company and their specific need.']},{title:'How does Moken educate startups? ',faqs:['Moken programs is the pillar of Moken where we educate and collaborate with startups and founders through:',"a. Future Founders: a program designed for students to get hands on mentorship from a startup founder or high level executive.","b. Ideation to Innovation:  an idea to MVP program designed and tailored to guide a startups from the idea to innovation stage. We then have moken.","c. Raising Right:  a program that helps startups and founders understand the science and the art of raising capital for their venture.","d. MokenLabs. MokenLabs is our investment program and currently our most selective program."]},{title:'Does Moken invest in startups?',faqs:['Yes Moken invests in startups but ONLY through our MokenLabs program. Applications for MokenLabs are still closed for 2021. We will have an announcement on our social media and our newsletter once we start taking applications so make sure to keep an eye there.']},{title:'What is Moken Events?',faqs:["Moken Events is where we network and connect with startups and founders. We host events that provide startups and founders with incredible connection opportunities. We also help founders and startups host events by doing it on their behalf and allow them to focus on what they are doing while we take care of the rest."]},{title:'What type of events does Moken Host?',faqs:["Each event type that is hosted by Moken is targeted towards a specific need for a startup. Our events include, but not limited to: Networking Events where we help organizations connect and meet people in the industry. Pitch Events to give startups with an opportunity to meet investors, and practice their pitch."]},{title:'Does Moken host events for startups?',faqs:["We have two different types of event hosting, we host events ourselves as Moken, and also host events in collaboration with startups."]},{title:'What is Access by Moken?',faqs:["Currently, Access is an exclusive, invite-only, digital network that we've built specifically for founders, startups, investors, and Innovators. Access is similar to LinkedIn, and Facebook, where you can create groups, different chats, and have ability to host events within it. Access allows entrepreneurs to step away from the traditional social media noise, and have a safe and inclusive space to connect and bounce ideas off one another and network with like minded individuals. \u2013 Much more to come - so stay tuned."]},{title:'What value can I get from joining the Access Network?',faqs:["By joining access you will be able to connect with other founders, ask questions to those who probably have experienced some level of pain, be able to talk about your startup in a safe space without feeling like you're selling or you're promoting your product, find specific solutions for specific problems that you might be facing, find startup jobs or talent."]},{title:'How can I join Access?',faqs:['The access network is an invite only community which you can join by requesting an invitation from an existing member or by submitting an invitation request through https://network.mokenstartups.com/']},{title:'Is it free to join the Access Network?',faqs:['It’s 100% to join our Access Network with an option to upgrade to different plans to access premium elements such as courses, or the Clubhouse which provides startups with hundreds of dollars worth of tools, discounts and rewards.']},{title:'How much does it cost to join the Clubhouse? ',faqs:["Clubhouse is only $4.99/month. So basically, you forego one coffee a month to access hundreds in discounts, offers, templates, ebooks, resources, and a ton of different curated content that has been provided by our amazing partners, such as HubSpot to help you build, grow and run your startup smarter, and more efficient."]}]};
